stepTitle: The addition of small amounts of iodine to table salt (iodized salt) has essentially eliminated this health concern in the United States, but as much as 40% of the world’s population is still at risk of iodine deficiency. The iodine atoms are added as anions, and each has a 1- charge and a mass number of $$127$$. Determine the numbers of protons, neutrons, and electrons in one of these iodine anions.
